traceability.evidence: Search of src and bin/dry-aged-deps.js shows no parsing or handling of a `--check` flag. README.md still marks check mode as “coming soon”. No tests reference or validate `--check` behavior or exit codes for check mode.
traceability.notes: The specification for check mode (013.0-DEV-CHECK-MODE) has not been implemented: the CLI does not accept `--check`, no tests cover it, and documentation remains placeholder.
